customhtml2._customHTML:
A LIMITED-EDITION ESCALANTE

THE ESCALANTE 3 FIERCE

REFRESH YOUR RUN.

customhtml2_11446045_2140172863._customHTML: The Altra classic you know and love takes on a whole new meaning with this limited-edition road shoe inspired by six-time USA Outdoor Track and Field Champion and Olympic athlete, Alysia Montaño.

customhtml2_11446045._customHTML: This limited-edition Escalante embodies the energy, strength, and confidence rooted in all women who make their own rules when it comes to their run.

image._alt: Color swatches that were inspiration for the Escalante 3 Fierce

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436._customHTML:
BEHIND THE DESIGN

Artist Maggie Enterrios worked with Alysia to bring the Escalante 3 Fierce to life with her bold floral designs and maximalist style. Using these vibrant and confident designs she captured exactly what Alysia Montaño embodies and what being a fierce woman is all about.

video._description: Behind the Design of the Escalante 3 Fierce

content._jcr:description: This limited-edition road shoe was inspired by six-time USA Outdoor Track and Field Champion and Olympic athlete, Alysia Montaño. Unleash your Fierce!
content._jcr:title: Escalante 3 Fierce
